Row.Text: When declaring friendship, Russia and their friend have halved [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance. Military Land Units gain the March promotion when near to a city following your State Religion.
Tsar
{1_CivName} Tsardom

Cheap Infantry Unit of the Enlightenment Era that can respond quickly to a threat. It gains +1 [ICON_MOVES] Movement when beginning its turn Fortified; increased to +2 if adjacent to another Leib-Gvardia.

This unique Line Infantry is useful for covering large distances. It gains an additional [ICON_MOVES] Move if beginning its turn Fortified, and this bonus is increased to +2 if it begins next to another Leib-Gvardia. Only Alexander I's Russia may build it.

The Licorne is the unique Field Gun replacement for Alexander I's Russia. It has a smaller bonus vs. Cities (150 instead of 200), but gains a 33% bonus vs. Gun Units. In addition, it possesses a 50% chance to withdraw before a melee attack can occur against it.
Our people are now idealising their faith and learning the irreplicable virtue of monarchy! We're quite content if the rest of the world were to also succumb to the influence of your culture.
Expel Foreign Scholars

Foreign intellectuals have wrought their liberal ideals upon the people of Russia for too long. Although we are no enemy to progress, we are first the guardian to the traditions of our people.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Russia (Alexander I) [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted from the beginning of the {1_EraDesc} Era [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]-10% [ICON_RESEARCH] Science from Universities [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+20% {2_Yield} from Universities

Foreign intellectuals have wrought their liberal ideals upon the people of Russia for too long. Although we are no enemy to progress, we are first the guardian to the traditions of our people.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]-10% [ICON_RESEARCH] Science from Universities [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+20% {1_Yield} from Universities
{1_LeaderName} has expelled foreign scholars from working at universities in {2_CivName}.
Form the League of Armed Neutrality

It is the right of every merchant to go about their business unspoilt by the territories of our foes. So let us, between friends, band together in protection of the neutrality of our entreprise.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Russia (Alexander I) [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have at least 2 Declarations of Friendship [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted from the beginning of the {1_EraDesc} Era [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 {2_ResourceDesc} [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]-10% Unit Maintenance [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+15% Military Unit [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Note: Civilizations with whom you have a Declaration of Friendship will also receive the effects of this Decision

It is the right of every merchant to go about their business unspoilt by the territories of our foes. So let us, between friends, band together in protection of the neutrality of our entreprise.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]-10% Unit Maintenance [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+15% Military Unit [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Note: Civilizations with whom you have a Declaration of Friendship will also receive the effects of this Decision
{1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName} has formed the League of Armed Neutrality with: {3_CivName}
The diminutive dolls called 'Matryoshka,' the specialty of a local craftsman in {1_City}, have become very popular for the way in which several smaller dolls can be nested within.
Metternich
The great statesmen, Klemens von Metternich, has elected our help to suppress the revolutionary liberals, who in the world are not only scoundrals but also murderers of spirit and culture.[NEWLINE]
We must invite him to our court at once!
We have nothing to say to this man.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain a free [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] {1_Unit}[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Gain a free [ICON_CULTURE] Social Policy[ENDCOLOR]
We have invited the reputed statesman Metternich to our court, to speak of the evils of liberlism.
Knowing ourselves to be an enlightened monarch, we have turned away the reactionary Metternich and all for which he stands.
Serfdom

One crucial issue has long gone unspoken in the halls of our government: the Serfs. Serfdom is an archaic mode of economic organization, and it no longer serves benefit to this country. However, to reform the system risks displacing not only millions of Serfs, but displeasing the hundreds of powerful nobles whom monopolize upon this system. One thing is for certain, however, reform is desperately needed.[NEWLINE]
Tell the Serfs to work harder and to forget about their rights!
Conscript the Serfs. They will make adequate soldiers.
Give the Serfs a modest sum and the right to land ownership.

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]All cities other than the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital have a 35% chance to go into 1 turn of [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain a permanent 25% boost to Worker Improvement speed[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]The [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital has a 10% chance to go into 2 turns of [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]All current Workers are converted into Gun Units[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]The [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital has a 25% chance to go into 2 turns of [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]All current Workers are converted into Settlers[ENDCOLOR]
We have made great reforms in respect to the Serfs - we have told them to stop moaning and work harder!
We have pledged to conscript all Serfs into the Russian military.
We have allowed the Serfs to own their own land and have contributed a modest sum to this cause.
{1_LeaderName} has conscripted the Serfs of {2_CivName} into the {3_CivAdJ} military.
{1_LeaderName} has conscripted the Serfs of {2_CivName} as Settlers.
Elisabeth Alexeyevna
